response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000. Considering its high quality and the significant benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product now, you can enjoy it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
